description:
Leakproof and easier to pack than liquid or powdered detergent, these little leaves of soap help you keep your gear fresh when packing light. Gentle soap formula works on everything from your hair, to your body, to your clothes.

  • 50 leaves of soap
  • Biodegradable, phosphate and paraben free
  • Light green tea fragrance
  • TSA carry-on compliant
name: Sea To Summit Trek  & Travel Pocket Laundry Soap
